title: Look at converting some social homes in city-centre flats into cost-rentals, says Taoiseach’s group
content: No decision has been made on whether that will happen, a Dublin City Council spokesperson has said. But it hasn’t been ruled out.

title: RTB tribunal finds Tramco renters are licencees not tenants, overturning a previous decision
content: The landlord argued that the renters in the Rathmines building were hotel guests and that they didn’t have exclusive occupation.

title: Office of Public Works starts ball rolling on GPO redevelopment
content: It has issued a tender for a feasibility study. The documents include few details, but they do confirm the likely future uses for the historic building.

title: ‘This is on a different scale’ – fans rave about Dublin Horse Show as the Netherlands swoop for Aga Khan Trophy
content: Day three of the 150th Dublin Horse Show was the busiest so far as a sellout crowd witnessed the Netherlands clinch the prestigious Aga Khan Challenge Trophy with an immaculate score of zero faults.

title: Modern Morals: ‘My teenage niece wants my help in getting the pill – but if I tell her parents it will destroy our bond’
‘There’s a lot of misinformation out there’ – how to prepare for the care costs of ageing parents and navigate the Fair Deal scheme
content: It’s hard watching your parents getting older, but talking to them about getting older can be even harder.

title: DAFT.IE PROPERTY MAGAZINE
content: A home gym, bar and room for a pool – luxury living for €3,950,000

title: ‘Waste of taxpayer money’: €2.5m spent on Cork housing estate now being partially demolished
content: Work started at the site in 2020 but was halted a few months later, leaving homes in an unfinished state.

title: Planning board overturns council’s refusal of planning permission for two new data centres
content: The planning board said the data centres proposed diesel generators must be replaced with a renewable source of back-up energy.

title: Ireland's biggest landlord sells 16 apartments for €6.6m and welcomes new rental regulations
content: The sales of the properties are part of the company’s asset disposal programme.
